title: Pet Friendly, Two Swimming Pools, 24/7 GOFit Fitness Center
posting_body: ['The Legacy at Druid Hills', '1491 Druid Valley Drive, Atlanta, GA 30329', 'Located in Atlanta, Georgia, The Legacy at Druid Hills is a beautiful apartment community that you would be proud to call home.', 'Our apartments in Druid Hills offer unmatched amenities, dedicated management and service team, and a location close to everything, The Legacy at Druid Hills lets you live as you’ve always wanted at a price you’ll love.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Lake and Jogging Trails', 'Online Business Portal', 'BBQ & Picnic Area', 'GOFetch Dog Park', '24/7 GOFit Fitness Center', 'Pet Friendly', 'Community Clubhouse', 'Two Swimming Pools', 'Lighted Tennis Courts', 'Playground', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
